name: YASTanks!
description:
Notice: This game may take a moment to load. Please be patient.

YASTanks! is a tank game (I know, very original) with a chaotic feel. Use the power of physics to push, shoot, and ricochet your way to victory!

Controls

W/S: Move

A/D: Turn

Space Bar: Shoot

Enemies

Be careful, a legion of evil tanks is excited to put an end to your journey. Here are some of them:

  • Dummy: This tank doesn't do anything. Pretty easy to kill!
  • Turret: These tanks are stationary, but they fire deadly and accurate bullets.
  • Mover: The Mover tank periodically jumps forward and shoots, meaning you will need to use your mobility to the fullest.
  • Bullets: Not just any bullets, YOUR bullets! Shoot wisely, as your own projectiles can bounce and kill you.

Good luck, and don't die (or kill yourself!)
